headline: L3Harris Showcases Robotic Drone Detection Capability for US Army
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla. - L3Harris Technologies has successfully demonstrated a new drone detection and defeat capability for its T7 robot system at Vanguard 24, an annual capstone experiment the U.S. Army...

headline: L3Harris CEO Provides DOGE's Musk and Ramaswamy Recommendations to Modernize National Defense Ecosystem
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., - L3Harris Technologies Co-founder, Chair and CEO Christopher E. Kubasik penned an open letter today to the leaders of the Department of Government Efficiency with recommendations...
